scripts.build: yarn build:css && yarn publish:icons && yarn publish:video && yarn publish:scripts && yarn publish:views && yarn publish:toastr
scripts.build:css: postcss ui/styles/tailwind.css -o public/styles/tailwind.css && postcss ui/styles/custom.css -o public/styles/custom.css
scripts.publish:video: copyfiles -f node_modules/videojs-youtube/dist/Youtube.min.js public/scripts/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/video.js/dist/video-js.min.css public/styles/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/video.js/dist/video.min.js public/scripts/
scripts.publish:toastr: copyfiles -f node_modules/toastr/build/toastr.min.css public/styles/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/toastr/build/toastr.min.js public/scripts/
